tool_description: Analyzes comprehensive campaign performance metrics including ROI, conversion rates, cost efficiency, and comparative performance against benchmarks.

campaign_id.description: Campaign ID to analyze performance for

comparison_benchmark.description: Comparison benchmark: industry_average, previous_campaign, or custom

error_messages: Invalid campaign_id: Campaign ID does not exist or is not accessible
Invalid analysis_period_days: Must be between 1 and 365 days
Insufficient data: Campaign has insufficient data for meaningful analysis
usage: Provide campaign_id and analysis_period_days. Optionally set comparison_benchmark and include_roi_analysis. The tool returns comprehensive performance analysis with actionable insights.

campaign_roi.description: Return on investment as a percentage

cost_per_click.description: Average cost per click in USD

cost_per_conversion.description: Average cost per conversion in USD

analysis_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when analysis was completed
